banner.content:
BLEND EVERYWHERE

Imagine the freedom of being able to go anywhere and blend your favorite smoothies, shakes, margaritas, or baby food without the limitations of a regular blender.

sections.heading: The Next-Gen Blender
sections.text: BlendJet 2 serves up big blender power on the go. We created the BlendJet 2 portable blender so you can make anything you want, anywhere in the world from a mountaintop to your kitchen countertop. Its easy and convenient to use at home, at work, outdoors, at the gym, in the car, at the beach, on vacation or wherever the day takes you.

sections.heading: Patented TurboJet Technology
sections.text: Traditional blenders only use their blades to blend, but we invented a new method that makes every other blender obsolete. Our secret weapon? BlendJet 2s stainless steel blades are offset from the center of the base, which creates a tornado effect that blasts ingredients into the back of the jar 275 times per second, resulting in dramatically better blending. This technology combined with a more powerful motor and doubled battery capacity makes BlendJet 2 five times more powerful than BlendJet One.

sections.heading: Perfect for Everything
sections.text: BlendJet 2 makes smoothie-bar-quality beverages, silky-smooth protein shakes, top-shelf mixed drinks and creamy frozen lattes, plus milkshakes, slushies, baby food, dips, dressings, sauces, and so much more. Well send a new recipe video straight to your inbox each week to inspire creativity and ensure you get the most out of your BlendJet 2.

sections.heading: Shake Up Your Routine
sections.text: BlendJet 2 is more than a blender its a way of life. It helps you live healthier while keeping your energy level sky-high. Make breakfast a breeze, reinvent lunch, fuel your workout or chill with a frozen margarita, all while saving time and money.

sections.heading: USB-C Rechargeable
sections.text: Get 15+ blends from just one hour of charging with any USB port. The BlendJet 2 portable blender is equipped with a water-resistant USB-C port that makes it easier than ever to power up. And the included cable is smartly reversible, so theres no wrong way to plug it in.

sections.heading: Self-Cleaning
sections.text: Say goodbye to the most annoying part of blending. Bulky kitchen blenders feel impossible to clean especially when youre in a hurry but BlendJet 2 cleans itself. Just add a drop of soap, a bit of water, blend, and youre ready for your next blended creation.

sections.heading: Collectable Colors
sections.text: BlendJet 2 comes in tons of vibrant colors and patterns with a design that complements your style. It looks great on your desk or countertop and is a positive reminder to enjoy something delicious and nutritious every day.

sections.heading: Food Processing with Pulse Mode
sections.text: With a double-press of the power button, your BlendJet 2 portable blender transforms into a powerful food processor that pulverizes veggies, fruits, nuts and more. You can pulse your way to tasty guacamole, pesto, salsa and hummus in mere seconds.

sections.heading: Forget the Measuring Cup
sections.text: Measurement markings on the jar make it easy to follow our mouth-watering recipes or to create your own. With its 16 oz capacity, BlendJet 2 holds 33% more than the original BlendJet in a sleek and compact design.

sections.heading: Water-Resistant & Ready for Adventure
sections.text: BlendJet 2 is also water-resistant, so you dont have to worry about getting liquid in the USB-C port or accidentally submerging your BlendJet 2 in the sink or pool. Its the ideal blender for mermaids.

sections.heading: Quiet Enough for a Library
sections.text: We engineered BlendJet 2 to deliver incredible power without the jet-engine sound made by clunky kitchen blenders. In fact, the BlendJet 2 portable blender is so quiet, you can use it during late-night study sessions or early in the morning without waking up your household.

sections.heading: Lock Your Blender
sections.text: Shift into Lock Mode to prevent accidental blending, and confidently toss your BlendJet 2 portable blender into your backpack or purse, or sip straight from the jar.

sections.heading: No Fridge? No Problem!
sections.text: Make healthy happen on the run with our nutrient-rich JetPack Ready-to-Blend Smoothies. Simply add milk or water to enjoy a creamy, delicious smoothie whenever, wherever. JetPacks are proudly made in California with only the highest-quality ingredients and no artificial anything. Add JetPack to your order today.

sections.heading: On a Mission to Improve Lives
sections.text: BlendJet was born after our co-founder suffered a debilitating injury and smoothies and shakes became a key part of his recovery process. After he (thankfully!) made a full recovery, he felt compelled to find a way to help others live longer and healthier lives. Our mission is to make the healthy choice the most convenient choice for all.

sections.heading: FREE 2-Day Shipping
sections.text: We offer free express shipping from our headquarters just east of San Francisco in Benicia, California. We take great pride in handling all of our own research and development, design, manufacturing, shipping and customer service.

sections.heading: 30-Day Money Back Guarantee
sections.text: Dont be fooled by imitators. Nothing else comes close to the quality, power and innovation of the BlendJet 2 portable blender. We guarantee youll love it, or your money back.

fields.title: Portable
fields.description: Perfect for jetting around town. Lightweight & durably constructed. Stash it in your bag & drink straight from the jar.

fields.title: Powerful
fields.description: Big blender performance, compact size. Patented TurboJet technology powers through anything in 20 seconds flat: ice, frozen fruit, leafy greens & more.

fields.title: USB-Rechargeable
fields.description: Lasts for 15+ blends & recharges quickly. Water-resistant USB-C charging port. Reversible cable included.

fields.title: Self-Cleaning
fields.description: Just add water, soap & blend. Rinse & youre ready to go!

fields.title: BPA-Free
fields.description: Mindfully designed to help you live well.

productWarranty.title: Extend Protection Plan with Accident Coverage - BlendJet

image.alt: Extend Protection Plan with Accident Coverage - BlendJet

features.title: LOCKED-IN FRESHNESS
features.subtitle: Just add milk or water (or anything else youre into) for a smoothie thatll make your tastebuds take flight. The fruit in JetPacks are picked at peak ripeness and immediately freeze-dried, locking in all the flavor, color and nutrients like fiber, vitamin D, calcium, iron & potassium. TLDR: theyre smoothies that taste good and are good for you. What can we say except youre welcome.

sections.heading: MEET THE JETPACKS
sections.text: A blender as awesome as the BlendJet deserves a smoothie thats just as awesome. So we created JetPacks to prevent an awesomeness parity. Each single-serving JetPack is loaded with the freshest fruits and veggies picked at peak ripeness and freeze dried to lock in all their goodness. Pretty awesome, huh?

sections.heading: R&DELICIOUS
sections.text: We know what youre thinking: sure theyre absurdly convenient, but how do they taste? So glad you asked! JetPacks were created in collaboration with the culinary masterminds behind some of your all-time favorite beverages. One sip of these delicious on-the-go smoothies and we think youll agree: they earned every cent of their obscene paychecks.

sections.heading: ... AND NUTRITIOUS
sections.text: Any smoothie can be tasty, but a smoothie thats delicious and nutritious: thats the stuff that dreams are made of. JetPacks are loaded with vitamins and antioxidants that nourish your body from the inside out. Not to mention theyre gluten-free, non-GMO, vegan, full of fiber, and have no artificial sweeteners, flavors or preservatives. That should silence even the pickiest of eaters.

sections.heading: A SMOOTHIE THAT MAKES CENTS
sections.text: JetPacks are your first and last step to kicking that expensive smoothie bar habit of yours. Now you can enjoy a smoothie thats as creamy and tasty as those overpriced store-bought ones without breaking the bank, or even standing in line. If youre looking for something to do with your old smoothie bar punch card, we hear it makes for a decent bookmark.

sections.heading: FRESH TECHNOLOGY
sections.text: The fruit inside JetPacks are picked at peak ripeness and freeze-dried to lock in all their flavor and nutrients. Think of it as a pause button for produce. To unpause, just press the blend button on your BlendJet. And before you ask, no we cant freeze-dry your face yet.

sections.heading: NUTRITION FACTS & INGREDIENTS
sections.text: This nutrition label is honor roll material, so allow us to brag like a proud parent: these JetPacks taste like super fresh fruit because thats what theyre made of. Theyre loaded with vitamins and minerals, have a natural sweetness derived from real fruit, and contain no artificial anything. We could go on about how perfect these little guys are, but well save it for an embarrassing Facebook post instead.
